item.title: Joseph add a quote by Rilke
item.description: "But this, though: death, the whole of death,-even before life's begun, to hold it all so gently, and be good: this is beyond description!" -- Rilke

item.title: Joseph add a quote by T.S. Eliot
item.description: "Quick now, here, now, always- A condition of complete simplicity (Costing not less than everything) And all shall be well and All manner of thing shall be well When the tongues of flame are in-folded Into the crowned knot of fire And the fire and the rose are one." -- T.S. Eliot

item.title: Joseph add a quote by Yevgeny Zamyatin
item.description: "During the first firing a dozen or so numbers from the dock neglected to get out of the way - nothing remained of them except some crumbs and soot." -- Yevgeny Zamyatin

item.title: Joseph add a quote by Yevgeny Zamyatin
item.description: "Listen." I tugged at my neighbor. "Just listen to me! You must-you must give me an answer: out there, where your finite universe ends! What is out there, beyond it?" -- Yevgeny Zamyatin

item.title: Joseph add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "Borrowed time and borrowed world and borrowed eyes with which to sorrow it." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Joseph add a quote by M. John Harrison
item.description: "Perception of a state is not the state." -- M. John Harrison

item.title: Joseph add a quote by M. John Harrison
item.description: "It's 2444. We're all someone." -- M. John Harrison

item.title: Joseph add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Sit, be still, and listen, because you're drunk and we're at the edge of the roof." -- Rumi
